parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine. Set the value to **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: IsDelete
parameters.description:
Indicates if the instance is deleted. Valid values:

- **false**: The instance is running.

- **true**: The instance is deleted.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group. For more information, see [View the basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).

> Only available on the Alibaba Cloud China site (www\.aliyun.com).
